eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.pets

Class WauzPet

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.pets.WauzPet

  • public class WauzPet
extends java.lang.Object
    A pet, generated from the pet config file.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • getOffspring

        public static WauzPet getOffspring(WauzPetRarity rarity,
                                   java.lang.String category)
        Gets a random new pet, based off its parent's rarity and category. 30% chance for a higher rarity, 60% for the same, 10% for a lower one.
        Parameters:
        rarity - The pet rarity of the parents.
        category - The pet category.
        Returns:
        The offspring pet.

      • getHigherRarityOffspring

        private static WauzPet getHigherRarityOffspring(WauzPetRarity rarity,
                                                java.lang.String category)
        Gets a new random pet, with a higher rarity than its parents. If that is not possible, a same rarity pet is returned.
        Parameters:
        rarity - The pet rarity of the parents.
        category - The pet category.
        Returns:
        The offspring pet.

      • getLowerRarityOffspring

        private static WauzPet getLowerRarityOffspring(WauzPetRarity rarity,
                                               java.lang.String category)
        Gets a new random pet, with a lower rarity than its parents. If that is not possible, a same rarity pet is returned.
        Parameters:
        rarity - The pet rarity of the parents.
        category - The pet category.
        Returns:
        The offspring pet.

        Parameters:
